title: Run regression tests for FO-08
description:
Run the FO-08 E2E test to verify FO-09 changes did not break FO-08.

FO-09 copies components from FO-08 into its own directory, so FO-08 should be unaffected. But verify:

1. Run: node --import tsx e2e/fo-08.test.ts
2. Verify it passes

If FO-08 test fails, investigate whether FO-09 changes inadvertently modified shared files (nav.config.ts, overview page, seed.ts).

Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
